header: What makes your scripts better than the other ones?
body:
Our scripts offer a huge variation of different mods and combos, I think the most major enhancements in my scripts are:

the number of new mods that don't exist on other scripts, i.e: Anti Damage Wobble,Reflex Triggers...etc.

And how easy it is to set up the script even with the complex and next level mods.

The constant debugging that our coders do to fix ANY issue that customers might have!

header: How do i know if you're legit?
body:
Checout our youtube channel and you will see that we have been doing this for a long time and for many games.

You can join our discord server where I have specific sections just for customer feedbacks & sale proofs.

header: How does the aim assist work?
body:
The Aim Assist will basically attempt to abuse the existing in-game aim assist in order to make it stickier,stronger,and more OP.

Aim assist makes it much easier to win gunfights, It will follow enemies *better* when you're aiming at them & stick harder when shooting at them.

Please note that Cronus scripts are NOT aimbot and you're not gonna get a result that's even close to aimbot,this is just aim assist that improves your aim.

header: Can I use MnK with your scripts?
body: Yes you can! Make sure to message our admins about it and we will guide you to get the best MnK settings once you've obtained one of our scripts.

header: Can I get banned using your scripts?
body: No, you can't get banned using any cronus or titan script,It is not illegal.

header: What consoles can I use your scripts with?
body:
Our scripts can be used on almost every console, every controller and every MnK.

Please let us know what set-up you're using before purchase and we will let you know if it works there!.

Head down to the bottom of this website and you will see links to all my social medias.

I usually respond in less than 12 hours depending on your timezone!

Our website currently doesn't support direct checkout so you're gonna have to message me on my social media (all links at the bottom of the site).

You can purchase using Paypal,Amazon card,PSN gift card,Credit card.
